author: Russell Brand
description:
Download the Allio App from the App Store / Google Play, or text “RUSSELL” to 511511. Investing involves risks. Including the potential loss of principal. Past performance does not guarantee results. See terms and conditions. 

Digital ID is being revived in Britain, packaged as a solution to immigration but carrying the stench of surveillance and control. Biometric data tied to finance means your very body becomes the passport — a mechanism for obedience rather than freedom. We’ve seen this logic before: crises are conjured, fear is stoked, and liberty is surrendered. The question is whether we accept a future where life itself is permissioned by the state, or reclaim technology to build true, decentralized democracy.
[UNPACKED]

title: What They Have Planned Next Is Truly Terrifying
